Bravados, The [1958 PAL DVD][En.Fr.It.De.Es Multisubs[12]

A classic Western tale of murder, passion and revenge. When a farmer's wife is raped and murdered, the farmer (Gregory Peck) teams up with his old flame (Joan Collins) to trail and kill the four outlaws he believes to be responsible. Arriving in a town, he discovers that the men are in jail and will be hanged the following day. When they escape, driven by a blinding need for revenge, the farmer gives chase, kills one and has another two cornered. But then they protest their innocence. A powerful Western tale of revenge and redemption.
